refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A tertiaryie identifies a third-level word or words in an indexentry.
In indexentrys, you can specify as many tertiary terms that are necessary. Secondary and tertiary terms can be mixed, following the primary.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: A tertiaryie occurs below a secondaryie. If more than one tertiaryie occurs, they are usually aligned with each other and indented from the secondary.
